name: WILDCARD (Q Yoneda)
description:
WILDCARD! Hit the wild card button, randomize the events on each level, and save your friends!

After thoughts.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Hi all! My name is Q Yoneda, a comic artist now trying to make video games.

This is my submission for this year's GMTK Game Jam.

My ultimate goal for every game jam I participate in is "finish & submit" (no matter how unpolished the game is at the deadline). So I had to cut back on many features I wanted to add. Here are some features;

  • More proper SFX
  • More diversity in random event occurance
  • More levels aka more puzzle
  • Wildcard limitations

+ Bug fixes (e.i. I just realized that the WILDCARD button is pressable on the title/instruction/game clear screens).

One "roll of the dice" circumstance for me was on Thursday, I decided to switch my engine to Godot from Unity. There are various reasons for that but basically, I needed to learn the basics of the engine within like... 12 hours? So there's that.

All in all, I was able to manage to wrap it up and make it work as a cute mini-game in time. I'm pretty proud of it.

I'd be honoured and very grateful if you happened to stop by this page and played this game. Thank you. Make sure to leave a comment and link to your game if you were a fellow participant! :D

Thanks,

Q
